|cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model= |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=5 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, J10 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J18 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Dual USB High-Side Power Switch;Sipex;SP2526A;;1;,,, 4-port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Terminus Technology;FE1.1;;1;,,, HDMI Port Protection and Interface;California Micro;CM2020;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Freescale Semiconductor;SGTL5000;;1,,, 8-bit Bi-directional Voltage Translator;Texas Instruments;TXS0108E;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate;Texas Instruments;SN47LVC125A;;2;,,, 14 Channel PMIC;Freescale Semiconductor;MMPF0100NPEP;;1;,,, Full Speed USB MCU;Freescale Semiconductor;M20AGV;;1;,,, 4A, 2MHz Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8070;;2; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, Audio in/out (3.5 mm), HDMI out, LVDS, MIPI, UART, SPI, GPIO, RTC |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08-dirty; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.17;Android 4.4.2; }} {{TagLine|RIoTboard i.MX6 Solo}} :[http://riotboard.org Product page]{{•}}[http://riotboard.org/hardware Documentation]{{•}}[https://www.embest-tech.com/prod_view.aspx?TypeId=74&Id=345&Fid=t3:74:3 Spec.] ===Wikis=== *[http://riotboard.org/wiki On '''RIoTboard''' Wiki] *[https://www.element14.com/community/community/designcenter/single-board-computers/riotboard/ '''Element 14''' Community] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2014/02/05/74-riotboard-development-board-features-freescale-i-mx-6solo/ ''RIoTboard'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/open-source-iot-sbc-cortex-a9-linux-android/ ''RIoTboard'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] ==Images== __NOTOC__
